author: woohyeonHeo
body:
#### PR description:
We remove L1Trigger dependency from DataFormats package "ME0Stub.h".
- Request from : [Pull Request #47373](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47373#discussion_r1981701211)

#### PR validation:

- The code format has applied with `scram build code-format` and tested with `scram build code-checks`
- The default process (e.g. reco, raw2digi, etc.) did not modified. Therefore, there is no change in running `runTheMatrix.py`
title: Remove L1Trigger dependency from DataFormats package "ME0Stub"
